Data

Class DataRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.DataRepository

  • public class DataRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A thread safe repository serving as an in memory database For accounts and loans. Note: currently some operations cost more processing because some of the interface contracts do not provide a userName when the data structure is optimised for a userName index.
